data.comment: The match has started, with Luton kicking-off.
Cauley Woodrow (Barnsley) has received a yellow card from Jarred Gillett.
In the minute 31, Luton's Luke Berry has been booked in Barnsley.
Jarred Gillett blows to end the first-half.
Barnsley kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
In the minute 52, Dominik Frieser is on a sub for Elliot Simoes for Barnsley.
James Collins (Luton) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Gerhard Struber is making the team's second substitution at Oakwell Ground with Romal Palmer replacing Marcel Ritzmaier.
In the minute 62, Kazenga LuaLua is replacing Elliott Lee for Luton at Oakwell Ground.
Goal! James Collins gives Luton a 0-1 lead.
Barnsley make their third substitution with Patrick Schmidt replacing Conor Chaplin.
In the minute 81, The away team replace Harry Cornick with James Bree.
At Oakwell Ground, Ruddock Pelly has been yellow-carded for the away team.
The away team have replaced James Collins with Danny Hylton. This is the third substitution made today by Nathan Jones.
